QuestData.Title: A Slow Death
QuestData.Description: The Dragonmaw have peons stationed at nearly every crystal formation up here. While the outright slaying of them would draw far too much unwanted attention to you, there is a way that we can thin their numbers and remain below the suspicious eyes of Mor'ghor.$B$BVenture into the wilds of Shadowmoon Valley and slay the tainted wildlife. Take from them their corrupt fel glands. Use those fel glands with this mutton that I'll give you near the peons. They'll take one bite and fall deathly ill!
QuestData.LogDescription: Yarzill the Merc at Dragonmaw Base Camp in Shadowmoon Valley wants you to use Yarzill's Mutton in conjunction with Fel Glands to poison 12 Dragonmaw Peon Camps.
QuestData.RewardText: <Yarzill speaks in a low whisper.>$B$BExcellent work, $n. Lay low for now. Come back to me tomorrow and we can do it again.
